name: Robota (Yahallo Games)
description:
You play with a robot named "Robota".
Help him to get out of the room.
Find clues to solve problems.
Memorize numbers.
Play mini games.
Solve puzzles to escape the rooms!!!

Controls

WASD - Move Around

E - Pick up items

R - Drop Items

V - Inventory 

Planned Features

- More Levels

- More Mini Games

- More Robots

- More Puzzles

- More Objects

- More Items
